title: Molecular Structure of Nucleic Acids: A Structure for Deoxyribose Nucleic Acid
summary: "Molecular Structure of Nucleic Acids: A Structure for Deoxyribose Nucleic Acid" was the first article published to describe the discovery of the double helix structure of DNA, using X-ray diffraction and the mathematics of a helix transform.
